subject: College Athletics
Football
Heisman Trophy
Baseball
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Teammates tease Oklahoma State’s Brandon Weeden, a leading candidate for the Heisman Trophy, for being older than half the starting quarterbacks in the N.F.L.
snippet: Teammates tease Oklahoma State’s Brandon Weeden, a leading candidate for the Heisman Trophy, for being older than half the starting quarterbacks in the N.F.L.
